snippet: James scored a season-high 41 points, and the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers overcame a 19-point fourth-quarter deficit to beat the Boston Celtics, 122-121, on Friday night.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers beat Boston Celtics, 122-121; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: James scored a season-high 41 points, and the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers overcame a 19-point fourth-quarter deficit to beat the Boston Celtics, 122-121, on Friday night.

headline.main: Cavaliers Edge Celtics as James Scores 41
headline.print_headline: Cavaliers Edge Celtics as James Scores 41
